content: When the beast finally falls, you’ll likely get a ton of experience, which you can invest in more skill trees that include a new one for your spells like Immobilize. The path forward is now clear to tread, but it’s still a little ways to the next Shrine. If you’re low on health, you can always head back to the Shrine and rest, as enemies like the Bullguard won’t respawn.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Bullguard.md', within the main section titled 'Bullguard', specifically from the subsection 'Where to Find the Bullguard' and the sub-subsection 'Bullguard Miniboss Fight and Guide'.
The content is as follows:
When the beast finally falls, you’ll likely get a ton of experience, which you can invest in more skill trees that include a new one for your spells like Immobilize. The path forward is now clear to tread, but it’s still a little ways to the next Shrine. If you’re low on health, you can always head back to the Shrine and rest, as enemies like the Bullguard won’t respawn.
